subject: Baseball
Barbers and Barbering
lead_paragraph: Many Mets players say they swear by the haircutting skills of Pedro Beato, a 6-foot-6 25-year-old right-handed relief pitcher.
snippet: Many Mets players say they swear by the haircutting skills of Pedro Beato, a 6-foot-6 25-year-old right-handed relief pitcher.
